p: Our estimates of HIV incidence among PWID are overall consistent with our epidemiological understanding of the HIV epidemic among PWID in each country 4, and are congruent with the estimated size of the epidemic in the whole population per UNAIDS Spectrum estimates 16. For example, PWID contributed the vast majority of HIV infections in Iran, a country with an established HIV epidemic among PWID 4, 5, 14 and where injecting drug use is the main driver of the epidemic at the national level 4, 24. Similarly, a small contribution of PWID to total incidence was found in Tunisia and Morocco; two countries where the HIV epidemic is mainly focused among men who have sex with men (MSM) and commercial sex networks respectively 25, 26, 27, 28, 29.
